Question: How results are prioritized
Logic / Mapping (summary): Age establishes the primary eligible franchise set using fixed bands (Under 18, 19–24, 25–34, 35–44, 45+). Clear Start is exclusive to Under 18. Top concern (Q3) confirms or redirects within the age-appropriate set. Sensitivity (Q5) may redirect to UltraCalming or apply Sensitive Swaps.
